name: DotBlot
description:
DotBlot is mobile co-op game you can play on just one phone!

Avoid colliding each other and enjoy smooth gameplay with polished visuals :)

Try to last as long as you can together and beat your own highscore!

Game made in just 24 hours for 3u-2o Mobile Game Jam 2018 by:

  • Małgorzata Sinius (Artist, Concept Artist)
  • Piotr Kwiatkowski (Unity3d Developer)
  • Grzegorz Kiernozek (Unity3d Developer)
